msg: Fix the testcase to make the output match the expected output. Axis C++ appears to be doing the correct thing.

author: whitlock
msg: Fix the handler tests by updating axiscpp.conf with the client.wsdd entry, after axiscpp.conf gets reinitialized, not before.
Also remove one of the duplicate definitions for updateConfigurationWithClientWSDDEntry

author: whitlock
msg: Fix TestSoapHeaderBlock by returning immediately from SoapHeader::serialize if there are no header blocks to serialize
